products.description_en:
A bold and transformative 100+ page guide for trans girls, sissies and femboys who long to surrender and blossom through long-term chastity. Step into a world where erotic pleasure is redefined — where vulnerability becomes power, and self-acceptance begins with submission.

This book gently leads you into the beauty of surrender, the thrill of denial, and the femininity awakened by surrendering control. Let desire guide you. Learn to love your body — and to understand your boundaries.
